QueryResult.text: select max(depth) depth, pf.child_partition_code partition_code, view_code, object_code, view_type from odf_view_partition_depth_v ovp, (select partition_code, child_partition_code from cmn_partitions_flat pfi, cmn_partitions p where p.code = partition_code and p.is_active = 1 union select 'NIKU.ROOT', code child_partition_code from cmn_partitions pi) pf where ovp.partition_code = pf.partition_code group by pf.child_partition_code, view_code, object_code, view_type union select -1 depth, partition_code, v.code view_code, object_code, view_type from odf_views v where partition_code = 'NIKU.ROOT'
